a.n: Give Back: A Hip Hop Story

p.k: The documentary 'Give Back' is about the rise of artists who, alongside their stage life, wanted to develop an activity that would allow them to share and give to their community. The film pays tribute to all these enriching actions that make hip-hop a noble and benevolent culture.
p.d: The documentary 'Give Back' is about the rise of artists who, alongside their stage life, wanted to develop an activity that would allow them to share and give to their community. Through intimate portraits, the spectator discovers how an association from Rennes has set up a sustainable hip-hop festival over the years and how American rappers and producers manage to combine their artistic and professional lives, both linked to their community. The film pays tribute to all these enriching actions that make hip-hop a noble and benevolent culture.
